item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Looks like a wonderful 16 days! We honeymooned in Fiji and stayed at the Shangrila and then at Mana Island Resort. It's so relaxing and I have very fond memories of both!
item.content:encoded: Looks like a wonderful 16 days! We honeymooned in Fiji and stayed at the Shangrila and then at Mana Island Resort. It’s so relaxing and I have very fond memories of both!
